医院账单没能找到她，但诉讼却找到了她——加上利息2016 年，贝瑟尼·伯奇 (Bethany Birch) 的隔膜疼痛持续了八个月。她知道这是由食物引发的，所以她说她尝试服用抗酸剂。这有点帮助，但最终她完全不吃东西了。她估计那段时间她减掉了 25 磅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/The-hospital-bills-didne28099t-find-her-but-a-lawsuit-did-e28094-plus-interest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/The-hospital-bills-didne28099t-find-her-but-a-lawsuit-did-e28094-plus-interest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04197217-dcca-490c-a544-a19ecb4ed193 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 06:38:37 -0400 The hospital bills didn’t find her, but a lawsuit did — plus interest
美国缉毒局 (DEA) 在新冠疫情期间放宽了在线处方规则。现在它想控制他们。联邦监管机构希望大多数患者在通过远程医疗收到可能成瘾的药物处方之前亲自去看医疗保健提供者——三年多来都没有这样做过。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/The-DEA-relaxed-online-prescribing-rules-during-covid-Now-it-wants-to-rein-them-in.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/The-DEA-relaxed-online-prescribing-rules-during-covid-Now-it-wants-to-rein-them-in.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61106f2f-5390-47bf-96ad-d58269058188 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 06:36:05 -0400 The DEA relaxed online prescribing rules during covid. Now it wants to rein them in.
新查尔斯顿博物馆向美国健康差异的历史根源致敬莫德·卡伦 (Maude Callen) 是一名黑人护士兼助产士，从 20 世纪 20 年代开始，她在南卡罗来纳州低地地区接生了 800 多名婴儿，当时种族隔离使黑人难以获得医疗护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/New-Charleston-museum-nods-to-historical-roots-of-us-health-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/New-Charleston-museum-nods-to-historical-roots-of-us-health-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cc7c7a2-0c72-4867-b88d-4e50efd844e1 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 06:34:47 -0400 New Charleston museum nods to historical roots of us health disparities

COVID-19 感染的严重程度是否是慢性疼痛的新危险因素？研究人员调查了 SARS-CoV-2 感染的严重程度是否会增加慢性疼痛的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Is-COVID-19-severity-of-infection-a-new-risk-factor-for-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Is-COVID-19-severity-of-infection-a-new-risk-factor-for-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d92554b-215b-4040-8287-d57025c958d4 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 05:38:00 -0400 Is COVID-19 severity of infection a new risk factor for chronic pain?

疾病负担审查评估整个欧洲风险因素造成的负担研究人员进行了系统回顾，以绘制疾病负担评估图，包括在欧洲进行的风险因素，并确定比较风险评估和其他风险评估方法中的方法选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Burden-of-disease-review-asseses-the-burden-attributable-to-risk-factors-across-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Burden-of-disease-review-asseses-the-burden-attributable-to-risk-factors-across-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2563e48-fbd0-49f2-8743-be181e3164ed Tue, 27 Jun 2023 04:52:00 -0400 Burden of disease review assesses the burden attributable to risk factors across Europe
